Text: Looks pretty sweet so far. Good work. Don't understand how to use the minecarts tho.. im at the part where it says walk on pad and look at chest to my left... Im not exactly sure what i need to do.
through the metal door and at the bottom of the ladder there is a minecart booster, get those 3 carts to push eachother around and then step on the pad
